MasterCSS.tests package¶

Submodules¶

test_auth.py contains unit tests for authentication.

MasterCSS.tests.test_car_management module¶

test_management_car.py contains unit tests for car management. Tests related to controllers under /mangement/cars which is used to manage car entries in db.
